title: Mary Kom:Mary Kom's Run At World Championships Ends With Semis Defeat, She Bows Out With Historic 8th Medal
text:
When Mary Kom sealed her place in the World Boxing Championships semis, she was assured of at least a bronze, meaning an 8th medal. She was extending her own record. She looked well on course for a 7th title.

PTI

But it was not to be. Mary lost to Busenaz Cakiroglu in the semis to end her unbeaten run in the tournament. See has six gold medals and one silver from previous editions.

Both boxers were defensive early on but Cakiroglu went on the offensive to win 4-1 by the time the bout ended.

PTI

Don't Miss 28.3 K SHARES 17 K SHARES 4.2 K SHARES

Meanwhile Mary is now number one among men and women when it comes to most world medals. Felix Savon has the most for men with 6 gold and a silver, a total of 7 medals.
